item.title: CVE-2024-49628|2024-10-20T13:50:29.081Z -- whiletrue -- most%20and%20least%20read%20posts%20widget
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WhileTrue Most And Least Read Posts Widget allows Cross Site Request Forgery.This issue affects Most And Least Read Posts Widget: from n/a through 2.5.18.
